rm.serverAdmin

Class ServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • rm.serverAdmin.ServerConfig

  • public class ServerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    ServerConfig is used to encapsulate a server's connectivity configuration, i.e. the address (hostname), receive port, and send port.

    • hostname - the address or hostname under which the server can be reached
    • receive port - the port under which the server can be reached
    • send port - the port under wich the server will answer


    An ServerConfig object can used within ServerAdmin objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rainer Mueller
